mapper.select: SELECT INQUIRY_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, CREATED_AT, SEPARATE FROM INQUIRY_T
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY_T( INQUIRY_NO , USER_NO , TITLE , CONTENTS , CREATED_AT , SEPARATE ) VALUES( INQUIRY_SEQ.NEXTVAL , 1 , #{title} , #{contents} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '여행상품' )
